title: The Professional Photographer's Legal Handbook - (Malestrom)
description:
<a href="http://www.image-upload.net/images/invakghbx3s4gfh9vsy.jpeg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.image-upload.net/images/invakghbx3s4gfh9vsy.jpeg</a>

Nancy Wolff - The Professional Photographer's Legal Handbook
Pages:272 | PDF | Allworth Press,U.S. (May 2007) | ISBN 1581154771 

This comprehensive and practical guide to the laws that affect the photographic industry is a must-have for anyone who wants to make a living licensing the rights to pictures. "The Professional Photographer's Legal Handbook" is an accessible and informative volume that guides readers through the intricacies of the laws that govern the use of images. It pays particular attention to the most pressing legal matters of the present day - the requirements, limits, and enforcement of copyright and trademark; fair use and public domain images; and privacy and publicity. It also provides detailed advice for drafting contracts and licensing agreements, as well as understanding their scope and value.
